movie_title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
title: More is not better
review: I was disappointed in the Sherlock Holmes movie. I just felt that there was too much mindless combat. It just went on and on and that annoying fiddle. Les combat more rich textured aerials of old London or some Victorian with a gorgeous library.

title: Mindless Crap.
review: Garbage. Mindless crap. This is a bad movie. This movie is not good.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
title: Corny
review: Too many one liners. Opening scene destroyed the whole movie. How did Leia survive space? Ridiculous.

title: Great Movie
review: Really enjoyed the chemistry between Law and Downy. Beautifully shot with a dark edge to it. Not too much mindless combat.
